subjects.name: Electric Circuits
subjects.description: Circuit analysis, network theorems, AC/DC circuits, transient analysis

subjects.name: Electromagnetic Fields
subjects.description: Maxwell's equations, electrostatics, magnetostatics, wave propagation

subjects.name: Electrical Machines
subjects.description: DC machines, transformers, induction motors, synchronous machines

subjects.name: Power Systems
subjects.description: Power generation, transmission, distribution, protection, stability

subjects.name: Control Systems

subjects.name: Electrical Measurements
subjects.description: Measuring instruments, bridges, transducers, data acquisition

subjects.name: Analog and Digital Electronics
subjects.description: Operational amplifiers, logic circuits, microprocessors, digital systems

subjects.name: Power Electronics
subjects.description: Power semiconductor devices, converters, inverters, motor drives
